basics.name: Michael Torres
basics.label: Senior Product Manager
basics.summary: Product leader with 6 years of experience driving B2B SaaS products from conception to launch. Focused on data-driven decision making and cross-functional collaboration.

work.name: CloudSoft Solutions
work.summary: Lead PM for enterprise analytics platform
highlights: Launched enterprise analytics platform generating $5M ARR in first year
Led cross-functional team of 12 (engineering, design, marketing)
Increased user retention by 35% through feature improvements
Established product metrics framework and OKR process

work.name: DataFlow Inc
highlights: Managed roadmap for data integration tool with 200+ enterprise customers
Conducted 100+ customer interviews to inform product strategy
Increased NPS from 35 to 58 over 18 months
